content.rendered:
Afees has excellent teaching experience of over ten years, and is currently a Doctoral Research Fellow at the Brunel University of London. He has interests in Data Mining, Pattern Recognition and Knowledge Discovery. He is a member of the Intelligent Data Analytics (IDA) group at Brunel.

Courses taught

  • Computer programming (Java, R) and Algorithm Development related courses at Brunel University of London
  • Computer science courses at Regent.

Research interests and publications

Odebode, A.A., Ye, Q., Sampalli, S. and Dey, S., 2018, July. KD1: A Sampling-Based Clustering Scheme for Large Data Sets. In 2018 IEEE International Conference on Internet of Things (iThings) (pp. 822-827). IEEE.
